mapper.select: SELECT c.cb_name,c.a_addr1,c.a_addr2,e.cb_no,e.e_no,e.e_name,e.e_regdate,e.e_enddate,e.e_content,e.num FROM clubbar c, (SELECT cb_no,e_no,e_name,e_regdate,e_enddate,e_content,rownum as num FROM (SELECT cb_no,e_no,e_name,e_regdate,e_enddate,e_content FROM event ORDER BY e_enddate ASC )) e WHERE c.cb_no=e.cb_no AND num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
